projects.title: Tetris
projects.alt: thumbnail of React tetris game project
summary: A personal rendition of the classic tetris game originally developed by Alexey Pajitnov.
Utilized the React JavaScript framework.

projects.title: Sweet Beats
projects.alt: thumbnail of sweet beats React website
summary: A playlist creator application that uses the Spotify Web API and OAuth 2.0 API.
The app allows the user to create playlists based on bpm, danceability, energy, instrumentalness, and valence (musical positiveness).
Users can enjoy a 30 second preview of songs in each playlist and save them to the user's Spotify account for later enjoyment.
Myself and three other developers created this application for a Chingu cohort group project during a six week span.
A design mockup is available to view which I created for the team through Figma.

projects.title: Movie Finder
summary: An IMDb alternative application created by myself and 3 other developers for a six week Chingu group project.
features: Search api integration to look for a movie
View details on a selected movie
Sign In and Sign Up modals
responsibilities: Designed a mockup for the team utilizing Figma
Developed Sign In and Sign Up components

projects.title: eCalendar
summary: A Front End only React calendar application.
The background image for the events panel change with the seasons as you switch months with the left and right arrows.
The data and month on the panel change as you select them from the calendar.
A sign in modal displays for the sign in button and an Add Event form displays when you click on the plus icon.
